channel.title: packages on Example YinYong Blog
channel.description: Recent content in packages on Example YinYong Blog

item.title: Bioconductor+CRAN镜像设定
item.description: Select a CRAN Mirror 显示所有的镜像信息: getCRANmirrors(all = FALSE, local.only = FALSE) 选择镜像: ## CRAN mirror chooseCRANmirror(graphics = getOption("menu.graphics"), ind = NULL, useHTTPS = getOption("useHTTPS", TRUE), local.only = FALSE) ## CRAN mirror chooseBioCmirror(graphics = getOption("menu.graphics"), ind = NULL, useHTTPS = getOption("useHTTPS", TRUE), local.only = FALSE) 显示当前BioC_mirror，options("BioC_mirror") 显示当前CRAN mirror, options("repos")和getOption("repos") 安装旧版本包 packageurl <- "http://bioconductor.org/packages/3.4/bioc/src/contrib/DESeq2_1.14.1.tar.gz" install.packages(packageurl, repos=NULL, type="source")
